name: SCStream
desc: An object that represents a stream of shareable content.

items.name: init(filter: SCContentFilter, configuration: SCStreamConfiguration, delegate: SCStreamDelegate?)
items.desc: Creates a stream with a content filter and configuration.

items.name: class SCContentFilter
items.desc: An object that filters the content a stream captures.

items.name: class SCStreamConfiguration
items.desc: An object that provides the output configuration for a stream.

items.name: protocol SCStreamDelegate
items.desc: A delegate protocol to adopt to respond to stream events.

items.name: func updateConfiguration(SCStreamConfiguration, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Updates the stream with a new configuration.

items.name: func updateContentFilter(SCContentFilter, completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Updates the stream by applying a new content filter.

items.name: func addStreamOutput(SCStreamOutput, type: SCStreamOutputType, sampleHandlerQueue: DispatchQueue?)
items.desc: Adds a destination that receives the stream output.

items.name: func removeStreamOutput(SCStreamOutput, type: SCStreamOutputType)
items.desc: Removes a destination from receiving stream output.

items.name: func startCapture(completionHandler: ((Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Starts the stream with a callback to indicate whether it successfully starts.
